verses.roman:
eta bali namaskari' gelā gopī-gaṇa
hena-kāle rādhā āsi' dilā daraśana

synonyms: eta bali—saying this; namaskari'-offering obeisances; gelā—went away; gopī-gaṇa—all the gopīs; hena-kāle—at this time; rādhā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; āsi'-coming there; dilā—gave; daraśana—audience.
translation: After saying this and offering obeisances, all the gopīs dispersed. Then Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī came and appeared before Lord Kṛṣṇa.
